Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-34064 affecting package python-jinja2 for versions less than 3.1.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-34064 affecting package python-jinja2 for versions less than 3.1.2-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-jinja2 is earlier than 3.1.2-2, affected by CVE-2024-34064
